Instruction: Cream together the butter and sugar in a medium bowl until smooth. Gradually mix in the egg and milk, ensuring the batter doesn't curdle. Sift in the flour, then gently fold it in until incorporated. Pour the mixture into a 1-pint microwave-safe bowl.
Cover and microwave on high until the pudding looks set when gently shaken and the top is sticky, about 3 1/2 minutes. Serve warm.
